patterns: What do you mean by SDGs?
responses: The Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), also known as the Global Goals, were adopted by the United Nations in 2015 as a universal call to action to end poverty, protect the planet, and ensure that by 2030 all people enjoy peace and prosperity.

patterns: What do you mean by Indicators?
responses: An indicator is a measurable aspect of environmental, economic, or social systems that is useful for monitoring changes in system characteristics relevant to the continuation of human and environmental well being.

patterns: When can I talk to you?
responses: I am always available to have a chat
Can't miss a gossip! Always here

patterns: What do I talk to you about?

Right now I am a very young chatbot don't have much to talk about :(

 3. Contact details

patterns: How can I distinguish if a program will be credited as a wellness, financial or fitness program?
responses: If it fulfils wellness criteria mentioned on the page then it will be credited as wellness and same for other programs.

patterns: How do i access the journeys in the new portal?
Access journeys in the new portal?
responses: You can visit the About Us section to know more about us. You can also go to the Announcements and Articles section. The Indicators and SDGs section will brief you more about our goals for the program.

patterns: What are some examples of the program not eligible for wellness program?
responses: All the programs which do not fall under the indicators and SDGs are not eligible for wellness rewards.

patterns: How do I know the submission status?
responses: You will get a mail with the status on the authors registered mail id
Happy to help :)
Any time!

patterns: what does the research on global warming focus on?
responses: Global warming: a gradual increase in the overall temperature of the earth's atmosphere generally attributed to the greenhouse effect caused by increased levels of carbon dioxide, CFCs, and other pollutants.

patterns: what does the research on mental health focus on?
responses: Mental Health: a persons condition with regard to their psychological and emotional well-being.

patterns: what does the research on Water focus on?
responses: This research includes a suite of approaches and studies that capture different aspects of the human dimensions of water quality.
